text: Santu Lussurgiu (Santu Lussùrzu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Oristano in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,369 people lived there. Its area is 99.8 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 503 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Oristano
title: Santu Lussurgiu
